EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Dealer B when leads are reassigned; email will be sent when unable to talk to Dealer B over the phone
EmailTemplate.name: Day 4: Dealer Reassignment (Email to Dealer B)
EmailTemplate.subject: SunPower Reassigned Lead(s) - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Opportunity_Recipient__c},
This email serves as a reminder that the following SunPower leads are reassigned to {!Account.Name} from another dealer due to no update.
Please ensure contact within 45min with each lead:
(Paste lead list here including oppty created date)
To update your lead(s) immediately, please follow these 3 easy steps:
1. Log on to the SunPower Partner Portal. 2. Go to Opportunities tab and select SunPower Leads from the dropdown. 3. Open the lead that needs to be updated and change the Opportunity Stage to ‘Contacted’. Save your changes.
If you have any questions, please call 1-800-SUNPOWER or email us at customersupport@sunpowercorp.com.
Regards,
Myrel SunPower Customer SupportTeam www.sunpowercorp.com 1800-SUNPOWER ext. 33637
